info.title: NewsCred Article API
info.description: Returns a list of articles according to the specified set of parameters.

get.description: Returns a list of articles related to the specified topic.

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Unique API access key

parameters.name: article_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables article_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: article_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of articles. Value is the name of the predefined article filter list (applicable only when article filtering is enabled via article_filter_mode).

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Limit items to the categories specified. Value is a space delimited list of dashed category names.  See Category module for more information.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Beginning of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]

parameters.name: get_topics
parameters.description: Set to true to include associated topics inline with each article. For faster response times, we recommend setting this to false unless topics are explicitly being used.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: The topic guid.

parameters.name: has_images
parameters.description: Return only articles that have associated images (accessible via article/GUID/images). Valid values are True or False.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: Limit items to those in the specified language. Value is a 2 letter ISO language code.

parameters.name: licensed
parameters.description: Search exclusively for fully licensed, full text content. Not available without a contract. Valid values are True or False.

parameters.name: media_types
parameters.description: Limit the media type of the returned items. Value is a space delimited list of media types. See Source module for a list of valid media types.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip before beginning the result set. I.e. a pagesize of 10 and offest of 10 will return items 11-20. Used for paginating api queries.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Number of items to return.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order for returned items. Valid values are date and relevance.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: List of sources to retrieve items from. Valid sources are specified as a space delimited list of source GUIDs.

parameters.name: source_countries
parameters.description: Search against only sources from the specified countries. Value is a space delimited list of 2 character ISO 3166-1 country codes.

parameters.name: source_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables source_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: source_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of sources.Value is the name of the predefined source filter list (applicable only when source filtering is enabled via source_filter_mode).

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: End of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]

get.description: Returns a list of articles according to the specified set of parameters.

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Unique API access key

parameters.name: article_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables article_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: article_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of articles. Value is the name of the predefined article filter list (applicable only when article filtering is enabled via article_filter_mode).

parameters.name: boolean_operator
parameters.description: Indicates the boolean operation to use on search keywords that do not have explicit whitelist (+) or blacklist (-) operators on them. The value can either be and or or.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Limit items to the categories specified. Value is a space delimited list of dashed category names. See Category module for more information.

parameters.name: exact
parameters.description: If this parameter is not specified, then stemming is applied, so that for example the query term ship matches articles containing shipping, and vice versa. Specifying exact=true turns stemming off.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Beginning of publication date range for which items are searched.

parameters.name: get_topics
parameters.description: Set to true to include associated topics inline with each article. For faster response times, we recommend setting this to false unless topics are explicitly being used.

parameters.name: has_images
parameters.description: Sort order for returned items. Valid values are date and relevance.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: Limit items to those in the specified language. Value is a 2 letter ISO language code.

parameters.name: licensed
parameters.description: Search exclusively for fully licensed, full text content. Not available without a contract.

parameters.name: links
parameters.description: Value is a space delimited list of article links. Articles returned must match one of links provided.

parameters.name: max_length
parameters.description: Returns only articles with at most this many words. For example, max_length=200

parameters.name: media_types
parameters.description: Limit the media type of the returned items. Value is a space delimited list of media types. See Source module for a list of valid media types.

parameters.name: min_length
parameters.description: Returns only articles with at least this many words. For example, min_length=100

parameters.name: mm
parameters.description: Minimum Match: specifies how many of the non whitelist/blacklist keywords must match for an article to be included in the results. Can be an integer (e.g., 1) or a percentage (e.g., 50%). The default value requires that all words match.

parameters.name: modified_since
parameters.description: Get only articles that have been modified since the supplied date. An articles modified date is the same as its creation date if it hasnt been modified.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip before beginning the result set. For example, a pagesize of 10 and an offset of 10 will return items 11-20.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Specifies the set of words and phrases to search for.

parameters.name: query_fields
parameters.description: Specifies which field to search when searching for articles.

parameters.name: safe_search
parameters.description: Removes articles containing offensive words from search result; when set to true.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order for returned items. Valid values are date, relevance, and modified_at.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: Limit items to the sources specified. Value is a space delimited list of source guids.

parameters.name: source_countries
parameters.description: Search against only sources from the specified countries. Value is a space delimited list of 2 character ISO 3166-1 country codes.

parameters.name: source_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables source_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: source_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of sources.Value is the name of the predefined source filter list (applicable only when source filtering is enabled via source_filter_mode).

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: Value is a space delimited list of topic guids. Articles returned must contain at least one of the topics provided.

parameters.name: topic_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables topic_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: topic_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of topics. Value is the name of the predefined topic filter list (applicable only when topic filtering is enabled via topic_filter_mode).

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: End of publication date range for which items are searched.

get.description: Returns an author that has written content available via this API.

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Unique API access key

get.description: Returns articles written by the specified author and matching the given query string.

parameters.name: source_countries

parameters.name: source_filter_name

parameters.name: topics

parameters.name: topic_filter_mode

get.description: Search for categories

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Unique API access key

parameters.name: autosuggest
parameters.description: If true, partial matches will be returned, i.e. the query pol will match the category politics. This is intended for use in autosuggest dropdowns.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query string to find categories matching.

get.description: Gets a list of sources that write most frequently about the category specified by the dashed name

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Unique API access key

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Beginning of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]

parameters.name: media_types
parameters.description: Space delimited list of media types to retreive articles from. See source module for a complete list of valid media types. Examples are mainstream and blog.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip before beginning the result set. For example, a pagesize of 10 and an offset of 10 will return items 11-20.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Number of items to return.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: List of sources to retrieve items from. Valid sources are specified as a space delimited list of source GUIDs.

parameters.name: source_countries
parameters.description: Search against only sources from the specified countries. Value is a space delimited list of 2 character ISO 3166-1 country codes.

parameters.name: source_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables source_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: source_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of sources.Value is the name of the predefined source filter list (applicable only when source filtering is enabled via source_filter_mode).

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: End of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]

get.description: Find the top news stories related to a given category. A story is a collection of similar articles.

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Unique API access key

parameters.name: article_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables article_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: article_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of articles. Value is the name of the predefined article filter list (applicable only when article filtering is enabled via article_filter_mode).

parameters.name: cluster_size
parameters.description: Number of articles returned for each story

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Beginning of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]

parameters.name: get_topics
parameters.description: Set to true to include associated topics inline with each article. For faster response times, we recommend setting this to false unless topics are explicitly being used.

parameters.name: has_images
parameters.description: Return only articles that have associated images (accessible via article/GUID/images). Valid values are True or False.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: Limit items to those with the specified language. Value is a 2 letter ISO.

parameters.name: licensed
parameters.description: Search exclusively for fully licensed, full text content. Not available without a contract. Valid values are True or False.

parameters.name: media_types
parameters.description: Limit the media type of the returned items. Value is a space delimited list of media types. See Source module for a list of valid media types.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip before beginning the result set. For example, a pagesize of 10 and an offset of 10 will return items 11-20.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Number of items to return.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: List of sources to retrieve items from. Valid sources are specified as a space delimited list of source GUIDs.

parameters.name: source_countries
parameters.description: Search against only sources from the specified countries. Value is a space delimited list of 2 character ISO 3166-1 country codes.

parameters.name: source_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables source_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: source_filter_name
parameters.description: Restricts the query to a predefined list of sources. Value is the name of the predefined source filter list (applicable only when source filtering is enabled via source_filter_mode).

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: End of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]

get.description: Search sources by name. Returns a list of sources objects

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Unique API access key

parameters.name: autosuggest
parameters.description: If true, partial matches will be returned starting from 3 characters, i.e. the query Bar will match the topic Barack Obama. This is intended for use in autosuggest dropdowns.

parameters.name: licensed
parameters.description: If true, return only licensed sources with fully licensed content. If false, return only sources with aggregated content. If left out, return all sources you have access to.

parameters.name: media_types
parameters.description: Limit the media type of the returned items. Value is a space delimited list of media types. See Source module for a list of valid media types.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query string to search on

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: List of sources to retrieve items from. Valid sources are specified as a space delimited list of source GUIDs.

parameters.name: source_countries
parameters.description: Search against only sources from the specified countries. Value is a space delimited list of 2 character ISO 3166-1 country codes.

parameters.name: source_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables source_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: source_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of sources.Value is the name of the predefined source filter list (applicable only when source filtering is enabled via source_filter_mode).

get.description: Returns the top stories related to the specified query. A story is a group of similar articles. By default, stories are sorted by a combination of recency and importance. If the from_date and/or to_date parameters are specified, stories are sorted by importance only.

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Unique API access key

parameters.name: article_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables article_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: article_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of articles. Value is the name of the predefined article filter list (applicable only when article filtering is enabled via article_filter_mode).

parameters.name: boolean_operator
parameters.description: Indicates the boolean operation to use on search keywords that do not have explicit whitelist (+) or blacklist (-) operators on them. The value can either be and or or.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Limit items to the categories specified. Value is a space delimited list of dashed category names. See Category module for more information.

parameters.name: cluster_size
parameters.description: Number of articles returned for each story

parameters.name: exact
parameters.description: If this parameter is not specified, then stemming is applied, so that for example the query term ship matches articles containing shipping, and vice versa. Specifying exact=true turns stemming off.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Beginning of publication date range for which items are searched.

parameters.name: get_topics
parameters.description: Set to true to include associated topics inline with each article. For faster response times, we recommend setting this to false unless topics are explicitly being used.

parameters.name: has_images
parameters.description: Sort order for returned items. Valid values are date and relevance.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: Limit items to those in the specified language. Value is a 2 letter ISO language code.

parameters.name: licensed
parameters.description: Search exclusively for fully licensed, full text content. Not available without a contract.

parameters.name: links
parameters.description: Value is a space delimited list of article links. Articles returned must match one of links provided.

parameters.name: max_length
parameters.description: Returns only articles with at most this many words. For example, max_length=200

parameters.name: media_types
parameters.description: Limit the media type of the returned items. Value is a space delimited list of media types. See Source module for a list of valid media types.

parameters.name: min_length
parameters.description: Returns only articles with at least this many words. For example, min_length=100

parameters.name: mm
parameters.description: Minimum Match: specifies how many of the non whitelist/blacklist keywords must match for an article to be included in the results. Can be an integer (e.g., 1) or a percentage (e.g., 50%). The default value requires that all words match.

parameters.name: modified_since
parameters.description: Get only articles that have been modified since the supplied date. An articles modified date is the same as its creation date if it hasnt been modified.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip before beginning the result set. For example, a pagesize of 10 and an offset of 10 will return items 11-20.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Specifies the set of words and phrases to search for.

parameters.name: query_fields
parameters.description: Specifies which field to search when searching for articles.

parameters.name: safe_search
parameters.description: Removes articles containing offensive words from search result; when set to true.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order for returned items. Valid values are date, relevance, and modified_at.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: Limit items to the sources specified. Value is a space delimited list of source guids.

parameters.name: source_countries
parameters.description: Search against only sources from the specified countries. Value is a space delimited list of 2 character ISO 3166-1 country codes.

parameters.name: source_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables source_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: source_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of sources.Value is the name of the predefined source filter list (applicable only when source filtering is enabled via source_filter_mode).

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: Value is a space delimited list of topic guids. Articles returned must contain at least one of the topics provided.

parameters.name: topic_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables topic_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: topic_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of topics. Value is the name of the predefined topic filter list (applicable only when topic filtering is enabled via topic_filter_mode).

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: End of publication date range for which items are searched.

parameters.name: guid

get.description: Returns a list of videos related to the specified topic.

parameters.description: Unique API access key

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Limit videos to the categories specified. Values are a space delimited list of dashed category names.

parameters.name: guid
parameters.description: The guid for the topic.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of videos to skip before beginning the result set. I.e. a pagesize of 10 and offset of 10 will return videos 11-20. Useful for paginating api queries.

get.description: Find the top stories that are happening for a given topic. A story is a collection of similar articles.

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Unique API access key

parameters.name: article_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables article_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: article_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of articles. Value is the name of the predefined article filter list (applicable only when article filtering is enabled via article_filter_mode).

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Limit items to the categories specified. Value is a space delimited list of dashed category names.  See Category module for more information.

parameters.name: cluster_size
parameters.description: Number of articles returned for each story

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Beginning of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]

parameters.name: get_topics
parameters.description: Set to true to include associated topics inline with each article. For faster response times, we recommend setting this to false unless topics are explicitly being used.

parameters.name: has_images
parameters.description: Return only articles that have associated images (accessible via article/GUID/images). Valid values are True or False.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: Limit items to those in the specified language. Value is a 2 letter ISO language code.

parameters.name: licensed
parameters.description: Search exclusively for fully licensed, full text content. Not available without a contract. Valid values are True or False.

parameters.name: media_types
parameters.description: Limit the media type of the returned items. Value is a space delimited list of media types. See Source module for a list of valid media types.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip before beginning the result set. I.e. a pagesize of 10 and offest of 10 will return items 11-20. Used for paginating api queries.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Number of items to return.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description: List of sources to retrieve items from. Valid sources are specified as a space delimited list of source GUIDs.

parameters.name: source_countries
parameters.description: Search against only sources from the specified countries. Value is a space delimited list of 2 character ISO 3166-1 country codes.

parameters.name: source_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables source_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: source_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of sources.Value is the name of the predefined source filter list (applicable only when source filtering is enabled via source_filter_mode).

parameters.name: topic_guid
parameters.description: The topic guid.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: End of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]

get.description: Search for a specific topics.

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Unique API access key

parameters.name: exact
parameters.description: If true, the topic name must match the query exactly. If false, partial matches are returned.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The query string to find topics for.

parameters.name: topic_filter_name

get.description: Given some search criteria, returns a list of topics related to those criteria.

parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Unique API access key

parameters.name: from_date, to_date
parameters.description: Find topics that were trending (written about more than usual) during the specified date range. For example, from_date=-1DAY finds topics that have been trending over the past day.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of topics to skip before beginning the result set. I.e. a pagesize of 10 and offest of 10 will return topics 11-20. Useful for paginating api queries.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Number of topics to return.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Find topics related to these keywords.

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: List of topics to retrieve items from. Valid topics are specified as a space delimited list of topic GUIDs.

parameters.name: topic_classifications
parameters.description: Limit results to those with the specified topic classification. Value is a space delimited list of topic classifications.

parameters.name: topic_filter_mode
parameters.description: Enables topic_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist

parameters.name: topic_filter_name
parameters.description: Limit items to a predefined list of topics. Value is the name of the predefined topic filter list (applicable only when topic filtering is enabled via topic_filter_mode).

parameters.name: topic_subclassifications
parameters.description: Limit results to those with the specified topic sub-classification. Value is a space delimited list of topic sub-classifications.

get.description: Returns videos matching the given query string

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Beginning of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]

parameters.name: licensed
parameters.description: Return only licensed videos. Only valid value is true. When not included, all videos are returned.

parameters.name: maxduration
parameters.description: Maximum duration for searched videos (in milliseconds)

parameters.name: minduration
parameters.description: Minimum duration for searched videos (in milliseconds)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of items to skip before beginning the result set. For example, a pagesize of 10 and an offset of 10 will return items 11-20.

parameters.name: pagesize
parameters.description: Number of items to return.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Query that you want to search on.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: End of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]
